The '''Pyroculus''' (plural '''Pyroculi''') is an Adventure Item that can be found scattered across [[Natlan]]. Pyroculi can be offered to any [[Statue of The Seven]] in Natlan for rewards, are limited and do not respawn, and will not appear in [[Chests]].

When a Pyroculus is within close proximity of a player, an icon will appear on their minimap along with a sound effect. Players can also use a [[Pyroculus Resonance Stone]] to mark the location of a Pyroculus on the map.

As of [[Version/5.5|Version 5.5]], a total of '''222''' Pyroculi can be found, allowing the player to achieve level 8 on Natlan's Statues of the Seven, with '''30/38''' toward level 9.
